file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 11-00-01-06 - PLACARDS - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL PLACARDS - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures for the inspection of the mandatory and non-mandatory placards. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY MANDATORY PLACARDS - VISUAL ALL 11-00-01-200-801-A ♦ CHECK NON-MANDATORY PLACARDS - VISUAL ALL 11-00-01-200-802-A ♦ CHECK EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 11-00-01 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 11-00-01-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. MANDATORY PLACARDS - VISUAL CHECK A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the inspection of the mandatory placards. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 20-12-01/200 - AMM MPP 20-12-01/400 - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task I. Visual Check of Mandatory Placards SUBTASK 211-002-A (1) Do a check of the mandatory placards for missing, unreadable, or damaged placards. (2) To repair the placards, refer to the procedures in AMM MPP 20-12-01/200 or AMM MPP 20-12-01/400, as applicable NOTE: To identify the mandatory placards, refer to the Additional Cross-Reference Section inside the Introduction of the IPC. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 11-00-01 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 11-00-01-200-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. NON-MANDATORY PLACARDS - VISUAL CHECK A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the inspection of the non-mandatory placards. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 20-12-01/200 - AMM MPP 20-12-01/400 - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION IPC 11-21-01 EXTERIOR DECAL, FWD FUSLG I AND II IPC 11-21-02 EXTERIOR DECAL, CENTER FUSLG I, II, III & IV IPC 11-21-03 EXTERIOR DECAL, REAR FUSLG I, II & EMPENAGE IPC 11-21-04 EXTERIOR DECAL, WINGS IPC 11-21-05 EXTERIOR DECAL, CORROSION PROTECTION IPC 11-21-06 EXTERIOR DECAL, WINDSHIELD IPC 11-22-01 EXTERNAL PLACARDS, FWD FUSLG I AND II IPC 11-22-02 EXTERNAL PLACARDS, CENTER FUSLG I, II, III & IV EXTERNAL PLACARDS, REAR FUSLG I, II & EMPEN- IPC 11-22-03 AGE IPC 11-22-04 EXTERNAL PLACARDS, WINGS IPC 11-31-00 COCKPIT PLACARDS AND MARKINGS IPC 11-31-01 PLACARDS, CIRCUIT BREAKER PANEL IPC 11-31-02 PLACARDS, CONTROL YOKE IPC 11-31-04 PLACARDS AND MARKINGS, CONSOLE PASSENGER COMPARTMENT PLACARDS AND IPC 11-32-01 MARKINGS IPC 11-32-02 PLACARDS, PASSENGER CABIN IPC 11-32-03 PLACARDS, PASSENGER CABIN IPC 11-32-04 PLACARDS, OVERHEAD BIN IPC 11-32-05 PLACARDS, LAVATORY IPC 11-32-06 PLACARDS, MAIN DOOR IPC 11-32-07 PLACARDS, OXYGEN LINES BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT PLACARDS AND MARK- IPC 11-33-00 INGS IPC 11-33-01 PLACARDS, BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT IPC 11-33-02 PLACARDS, BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT ELECTR COMPART, REAR FUSLG, PLACARDS AND IPC 11-34-01 MARKINGS EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-802-A/600 11-00-01 Page 3 of 4 Rev 55 - Oct 29/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task I. Visual Check of Non-Mandatory Placards SUBTASK 211-003-A (1) To identify the non-mandatory placards, refer to the subsequent in IPC 11-21-01, IPC 11-21-02, IPC 11-21-03, IPC 11-21-04, IPC 11-21-05, IPC 11-21-06, IPC 11-22-01, IPC 11-22-02, IPC 11-22-03, IPC 11-22-04, IPC 11-31-00, IPC 11-31-01, IPC 11-31-02, IPC 11-31-04, IPC 11-32-01, IPC 11-32-02, IPC 11-32-03, IPC 11-32-04, IPC 11-32-05, IPC 11-32-06, IPC 11-32-07, IPC 11-33-00, IPC 11-33-01, IPC 11-33-02, IPC 11-34-01, and do not consider the mandatory placard shown in the Additional Cross-Reference Section inside the Introduction of the IPC. (2) Do a check of the non-mandatory placards for missing, unreadable, or damaged placards. (3) To repair the placards, refer to the procedures in AMM MPP 20-12-01/200 or AMM MPP 20-12-01/400, as applicable.
